h5pactivity.name: Learning Check 1
h5pactivity.intro: You’re more than halfway to completing this course! Let’s take a moment for a knowledge check and review on the previous units. Once finished, select the link titled "Unit 4: Teacher Competencies for Adult Career Pathways" at the bottom to move to the next section.

result.additionals: {"extensions":{"http:\/\/h5p.org\/x-api\/h5p-local-content-id":9},"contextExtensions":{}}

result.description: Which are benefits of contextualized instruction in adult career pathways as discussed in Units 1, 2, and 3? Choose all that apply.
result.additionals:
{"choices":[{"id":"1","description":{"en-US":"Allows for non-traditional students to access in-demand jobs 
"}},{"id":"2","description":{"en-US":"Gives employers an opportunity to hire from within their community
"}},{"id":"0","description":{"en-US":"Help adults with low basic skills earn valued occupational credentials, obtain well-paying jobs, and sustain rewarding careers
"}},{"id":"3","description":{"en-US":"Students are exposed to authentic workplace content
"}}],"extensions":{"http://h5p.org/x-api/h5p-local-content-id":9,"http://h5p.org/x-api/h5p-subContentId":"f677be34-9ec1-4163-afc0-000de25cf972"},"contextExtensions":{}}

result.description: From the list below, which content standards or skills are integrated or included in contextualized instruction in adult career pathways? Choose all that apply.
result.additionals:
{"choices":[{"id":"3","description":{"en-US":"Academic knowledge or basic skills
"}},{"id":"0","description":{"en-US":"Career or technical skills
"}},{"id":"2","description":{"en-US":"Employability skills
"}},{"id":"4","description":{"en-US":"Extended standards
"}},{"id":"1","description":{"en-US":"Health education or physical education standards
"}}],"extensions":{"http://h5p.org/x-api/h5p-local-content-id":9,"http://h5p.org/x-api/h5p-subContentId":"310e34ce-7b83-4fb4-a4b4-cfc51d15b8f9"},"contextExtensions":{}}

result.description: From the list below, which learning and instructional strategies should be included in contextualized instruction for ACPs? Choose all that apply.
result.additionals:
{"choices":[{"id":"4","description":{"en-US":"Visible thinking routines
"}},{"id":"0","description":{"en-US":"Active learning strategies
"}},{"id":"2","description":{"en-US":"Project-based learning
"}},{"id":"5","description":{"en-US":"Self-paced study of all content standards and skill areas
"}},{"id":"3","description":{"en-US":"3 hours lecatures on technical or career topic
"}},{"id":"1","description":{"en-US":"Problem-based learning
"}}],"extensions":{"http://h5p.org/x-api/h5p-local-content-id":9,"http://h5p.org/x-api/h5p-subContentId":"e94846a0-ad7b-488f-815e-8138f8f99514"},"contextExtensions":{}}
